overview:
tplink-router: 3 tools; tplink_get_status -> Get router status including WAN, WiFi, and device counts.

    Provides overview of router health..., tplink_list_devices -> List all devices connected to the router with IPs and MACs.

    Shows currently connected devices including hostnames, IP addresses,
    MAC addresses, and connection type (wired/wireless)., tplink_list_reservations -> List all DHCP address reservations (static IPs).

    Shows devices with reserved/static IP addre...
